entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
